wordpressPage.content:
Centropa is a new restaurant concept located in the new Deichman Library in Bjørvika.

Under the creative leadership of chef Tore Namstad, Centropa serves up innovative takes on European cuisine.

You can choose your dining experience at Centropa: Visit our main restaurant on the ground floor for sit-down eats, check out the second floor cantina for a quick bite, or get a coffee and bun for the road at our café kiosk near the entrance to Deichman.
